-- Jolteon

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
Evolve	Thunder Shock	Thunder Shock - Electric-type	Thunder Shock: Special Move	40	100	30	10
A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
—	Thunder Shock	Thunder Shock - Electric-type	Thunder Shock: Special Move	40	100	30	10
A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
—	Covet	Covet - Normal-type	Covet: Physical Move	60	100	25	--
The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.
—	Swift	Swift - Normal-type	Swift: Special Move	60	101	20	--
Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
—	Bite	Bite - Dark-type	Bite: Physical Move	60	100	25	30
The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
—	Copycat	Copycat - Normal-type	Copycat: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.
—	Baton Pass	Baton Pass - Normal-type	Baton Pass: Other Move	--	101	40	--
The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.
—	Take Down	Take Down - Normal-type	Take Down: Physical Move	90	85	20	--
A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
—	Charm	Charm - Fairy-type	Charm: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.
—	Double-Edge	Double-Edge - Normal-type	Double-Edge: Physical Move	120	100	15	--
A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.
—	Helping Hand	Helping Hand - Normal-type	Helping Hand: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.
—	Tackle	Tackle - Normal-type	Tackle: Physical Move	40	100	35	--
A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
—	Growl	Growl - Normal-type	Growl: Other Move	--	100	40	--
The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
—	Tail Whip	Tail Whip - Normal-type	Tail Whip: Other Move	--	100	30	--
The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stats.
5	Sand Attack	Sand Attack - Ground-type	Sand Attack: Other Move	--	100	15	--
Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.
10	Quick Attack	Quick Attack - Normal-type	Quick Attack: Physical Move	40	100	30	--
The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.
15	Baby-Doll Eyes	Baby-Doll Eyes - Fairy-type	Baby-Doll Eyes: Other Move	--	100	30	--
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.
20	Thunder Wave	Thunder Wave - Electric-type	Thunder Wave: Other Move	--	90	20	--
The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.
25	Double Kick	Double Kick - Fighting-type	Double Kick: Physical Move	30	100	30	--
The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.
30	Thunder Fang	Thunder Fang - Electric-type	Thunder Fang: Physical Move	65	95	15	10
The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.
35	Pin Missile	Pin Missile - Bug-type	Pin Missile: Physical Move	25	95	20	--
Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
40	Discharge	Discharge - Electric-type	Discharge: Special Move	80	100	15	30
The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.
45	Agility	Agility - Psychic-type	Agility: Other Move	--	101	30	--
The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
50	Thunder	Thunder - Electric-type	Thunder: Special Move	110	70	10	30
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
55	Last Resort	Last Resort - Normal-type	Last Resort: Physical Move	140	100	5	--
This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

—	Take Down	Take Down - Normal-type	Take Down: Physical Move	90	85	20	--
A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
—	Charm	Charm - Fairy-type	Charm: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.
—	Double-Edge	Double-Edge - Normal-type	Double-Edge: Physical Move	120	100	15	--
A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.
—	Helping Hand	Helping Hand - Normal-type	Helping Hand: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.
—	Tackle	Tackle - Normal-type	Tackle: Physical Move	40	100	35	--
A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
—	Growl	Growl - Normal-type	Growl: Other Move	--	100	40	--
The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
—	Tail Whip	Tail Whip - Normal-type	Tail Whip: Other Move	--	100	30	--
The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stats.
5	Sand Attack	Sand Attack - Ground-type	Sand Attack: Other Move	--	100	15	--
Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.
10	Quick Attack	Quick Attack - Normal-type	Quick Attack: Physical Move	40	100	30	--
The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.
15	Baby-Doll Eyes	Baby-Doll Eyes - Fairy-type	Baby-Doll Eyes: Other Move	--	100	30	--
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.
20	Confuse Ray	Confuse Ray - Ghost-type	Confuse Ray: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.
25	Assurance	Assurance - Dark-type	Assurance: Physical Move	60	100	10	--
If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.
30	Moonlight	Moonlight - Fairy-type	Moonlight: Other Move	--	101	5	--
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
35	Guard Swap	Guard Swap - Psychic-type	Guard Swap: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.
40	Dark Pulse	Dark Pulse - Dark-type	Dark Pulse: Special Move	80	100	15	20
The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.
45	Screech	Screech - Normal-type	Screech: Other Move	--	85	40	--

50	Mean Look	Mean Look - Normal-type	Mean Look: Other Move	--	101	5	--

55	Last Resort	Last Resort - Normal-type	Last Resort: Physical Move	140	100	5	--
This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

33	Play Rough	Play Rough - Fairy-type	Play Rough: Physical Move	90	90	10	10
The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.
36	Cotton Guard	Cotton Guard - Grass-type	Cotton Guard: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user's Defense stat.
39	Endeavor	Endeavor - Normal-type	Endeavor: Physical Move	??	100	5	--
This attack move cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user's party.

15	Fake Tears	Fake Tears - Dark-type	Fake Tears: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

30	Wish	Wish - Normal-type	Wish: Other Move	--	101	10	--

39	Skill Swap	Skill Swap - Psychic-type	Skill Swap: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
20	Headbutt	Headbutt - Normal-type	Headbutt: Physical Move	70	100	15	30
The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.
24	Crunch	Crunch - Dark-type	Crunch: Physical Move	80	100	15	20
The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
28	Soak	Soak - Water-type	Soak: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.
32	Entrainment	Entrainment - Normal-type	Entrainment: Other Move	--	100	15	--

44	Leech Life	Leech Life - Bug-type	Leech Life: Physical Move	80	100	10	--

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Poison Sting	Poison Sting - Poison-type	Poison Sting: Physical Move	15	100	35	30
The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.
—	Mud-Slap	Mud-Slap - Ground-type	Mud-Slap: Special Move	20	100	10	100
The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
4	Astonish	Astonish - Ghost-type	Astonish: Physical Move	30	100	15	30
The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.
8	Taunt	Taunt - Dark-type	Taunt: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
12	Flatter	Flatter - Dark-type	Flatter: Other Move	--	100	15	--
Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.
16	Revenge	Revenge - Fighting-type	Revenge: Physical Move	60	100	10	--
This attack move's power is doubled if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.
20	Venoshock	Venoshock - Poison-type	Venoshock: Special Move	65	100	10	--
The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
24	Sucker Punch	Sucker Punch - Dark-type	Sucker Punch: Physical Move	70	100	5	--
This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
28	Swagger	Swagger - Normal-type	Swagger: Other Move	--	85	15	--
The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.
32	Poison Jab	Poison Jab - Poison-type	Poison Jab: Physical Move	80	100	20	30
The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
36	Toxic	Toxic - Poison-type	Toxic: Other Move	--	90	10	--
A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
40	Nasty Plot	Nasty Plot - Dark-type	Nasty Plot: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.
44	Sludge Bomb	Sludge Bomb - Poison-type	Sludge Bomb: Special Move	90	100	10	30
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
48	Belch	Belch - Poison-type	Belch: Special Move	120	90	10	--
The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

-- Scraggy

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Low Kick	Low Kick - Fighting-type	Low Kick: Physical Move	??	100	20	--
A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.
—	Leer	Leer - Normal-type	Leer: Other Move	--	100	30	100
The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.
4	Payback	Payback - Dark-type	Payback: Physical Move	50	100	10	--
The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.
8	Headbutt	Headbutt - Normal-type	Headbutt: Physical Move	70	100	15	30
The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.
12	Sand Attack	Sand Attack - Ground-type	Sand Attack: Other Move	--	100	15	--
Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.
16	Facade	Facade - Normal-type	Facade: Physical Move	70	100	20	--
This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.
20	Protect	Protect - Normal-type	Protect: Other Move	--	101	10	--
This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
24	Beat Up	Beat Up - Dark-type	Beat Up: Physical Move	??	100	10	--
The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.
28	Scary Face	Scary Face - Normal-type	Scary Face: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
32	Brick Break	Brick Break - Fighting-type	Brick Break: Physical Move	75	100	15	--
The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.
36	Swagger	Swagger - Normal-type	Swagger: Other Move	--	85	15	--
The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.
40	Crunch	Crunch - Dark-type	Crunch: Physical Move	80	100	15	20
The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
44	High Jump Kick	High Jump Kick - Fighting-type	High Jump Kick: Physical Move	130	90	10	--
The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.
48	Focus Punch	Focus Punch - Fighting-type	Focus Punch: Physical Move	150	100	20	--
The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.
52	Head Smash	Head Smash - Rock-type	Head Smash: Physical Move	150	80	5	--
The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

-- Shuckle

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Withdraw	Withdraw - Water-type	Withdraw: Other Move	--	101	40	--
The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.
—	Wrap	Wrap - Normal-type	Wrap: Physical Move	15	90	20	100
A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.
5	Rollout	Rollout - Rock-type	Rollout: Physical Move	30	90	20	--
The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.
10	Struggle Bug	Struggle Bug - Bug-type	Struggle Bug: Special Move	50	100	20	100
While resisting, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stats of those hit.
15	Rock Throw	Rock Throw - Rock-type	Rock Throw: Physical Move	50	90	15	--
The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.
20	Safeguard	Safeguard - Normal-type	Safeguard: Other Move	--	101	25	--
The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.
25	Rest	Rest - Psychic-type	Rest: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.
30	Bug Bite	Bug Bite - Bug-type	Bug Bite: Physical Move	60	100	20	--
The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
35	Power Split	Power Split - Psychic-type	Power Split: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.
35	Guard Split	Guard Split - Psychic-type	Guard Split: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
40	Rock Slide	Rock Slide - Rock-type	Rock Slide: Physical Move	75	90	10	30
Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
45	Gastro Acid	Gastro Acid - Poison-type	Gastro Acid: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.
50	Sticky Web	Sticky Web - Bug-type	Sticky Web: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.
55	Power Trick	Power Trick - Psychic-type	Power Trick: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.
60	Stone Edge	Stone Edge - Rock-type	Stone Edge: Physical Move	100	80	5	--
The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.
65	Shell Smash	Shell Smash - Normal-type	Shell Smash: Other Move	--	101	15	--
The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.
12	Mud Shot	Mud Shot - Ground-type	Mud Shot: Special Move	55	95	15	100
The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.
16	Bug Bite	Bug Bite - Bug-type	Bug Bite: Physical Move	60	100	20	--
The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
20	Iron Defense	Iron Defense - Steel-type	Iron Defense: Other Move	--	101	15	--
The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.
24	Sucker Punch	Sucker Punch - Dark-type	Sucker Punch: Physical Move	70	100	5	--
This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
28	Slash	Slash - Normal-type	Slash: Physical Move	70	100	20	--
The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
32	Razor Shell	Razor Shell - Water-type	Razor Shell: Physical Move	75	95	10	50
The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
36	Pin Missile	Pin Missile - Bug-type	Pin Missile: Physical Move	25	95	20	--
Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
40	Swords Dance	Swords Dance - Normal-type	Swords Dance: Other Move	--	101	20	--
A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.
44	Liquidation	Liquidation - Water-type	Liquidation: Physical Move	85	100	10	20
The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.
16	Assurance	Assurance - Dark-type	Assurance: Physical Move	60	100	10	--
If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.
20	Sludge	Sludge - Poison-type	Sludge: Special Move	65	100	20	30
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
24	Haze	Haze - Ice-type	Haze: Other Move	--	101	30	--
The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
28	Self-Destruct	Self-Destruct - Normal-type	Self-Destruct: Physical Move	200	100	5	--
The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
32	Sludge Bomb	Sludge Bomb - Poison-type	Sludge Bomb: Special Move	90	100	10	30
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
38	Toxic	Toxic - Poison-type	Toxic: Other Move	--	90	10	--
A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
44	Belch	Belch - Poison-type	Belch: Special Move	120	90	10	--
The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.
50	Explosion	Explosion - Normal-type	Explosion: Physical Move	250	100	5	--
The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
56	Memento	Memento - Dark-type	Memento: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
62	Destiny Bond	Destiny Bond - Ghost-type	Destiny Bond: Other Move	--	101	5	--
After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

-- Bonsly

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Fake Tears	Fake Tears - Dark-type	Fake Tears: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.
—	Copycat	Copycat - Normal-type	Copycat: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.
4	Flail	Flail - Normal-type	Flail: Physical Move	??	100	15	--
The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.
8	Rock Throw	Rock Throw - Rock-type	Rock Throw: Physical Move	50	90	15	--
The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.
12	Block	Block - Normal-type	Block: Other Move	--	101	5	--
The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
16	Mimic	Mimic - Normal-type	Mimic: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
20	Rock Tomb	Rock Tomb - Rock-type	Rock Tomb: Physical Move	60	95	15	100
Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by preventing its movement.
24	Tearful Look	Tearful Look - Normal-type	Tearful Look: Other Move	--	101	20	100
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
28	Sucker Punch	Sucker Punch - Dark-type	Sucker Punch: Physical Move	70	100	5	--
This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
32	Rock Slide	Rock Slide - Rock-type	Rock Slide: Physical Move	75	90	10	30
Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
36	Low Kick	Low Kick - Fighting-type	Low Kick: Physical Move	??	100	20	--
A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.
40	Counter	Counter - Fighting-type	Counter: Physical Move	??	100	20	--
A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
44	Double-Edge	Double-Edge - Normal-type	Double-Edge: Physical Move	120	100	15	--
A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

20	Charm	Charm - Fairy-type	Charm: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.

The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
—	Defense Curl	Defense Curl - Normal-type	Defense Curl: Other Move	--	101	40	--
The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
4	Stored Power	Stored Power - Psychic-type	Stored Power: Special Move	20	100	10	--
The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.
8	Minimize	Minimize - Normal-type	Minimize: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
12	After You	After You - Normal-type	After You: Other Move	--	101	15	--
The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
16	Life Dew	Life Dew - Water-type	Life Dew: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.
20	Metronome	Metronome - Normal-type	Metronome: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.
24	Moonlight	Moonlight - Fairy-type	Moonlight: Other Move	--	101	5	--
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
28	Gravity	Gravity - Psychic-type	Gravity: Other Move	--	101	5	--
This move enables Flying-type Pokémon or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves. Moves that involve flying can't be used.
32	Meteor Mash	Meteor Mash - Steel-type	Meteor Mash: Physical Move	90	90	10	20
The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.
36	Follow Me	Follow Me - Normal-type	Follow Me: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.
40	Cosmic Power	Cosmic Power - Psychic-type	Cosmic Power: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
44	Moonblast	Moonblast - Fairy-type	Moonblast: Special Move	95	100	15	30
Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.
48	Healing Wish	Healing Wish - Psychic-type	Healing Wish: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.
52	Wish	Wish - Normal-type	Wish: Other Move	--	101	10	--

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Lick	Lick - Ghost-type	Lick: Physical Move	30	100	30	30

4	Defense Curl	Defense Curl - Normal-type	Defense Curl: Other Move	--	101	40	--
The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
8	Recycle	Recycle - Normal-type	Recycle: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.
12	Covet	Covet - Normal-type	Covet: Physical Move	60	100	25	--
The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.
16	Bite	Bite - Dark-type	Bite: Physical Move	60	100	25	30
The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
20	Stockpile	Stockpile - Normal-type	Stockpile: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used three times.
20	Swallow	Swallow - Normal-type	Swallow: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.
24	Screech	Screech - Normal-type	Screech: Other Move	--	85	40	--
An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.
28	Body Slam	Body Slam - Normal-type	Body Slam: Physical Move	85	100	15	30
The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
32	Fling	Fling - Dark-type	Fling: Physical Move	??	100	10	--
The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.
36	Amnesia	Amnesia - Psychic-type	Amnesia: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.
40	Metronome	Metronome - Normal-type	Metronome: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.
44	Flail	Flail - Normal-type	Flail: Physical Move	??	100	15	--
The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.
48	Belly Drum	Belly Drum - Normal-type	Belly Drum: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.
52	Last Resort	Last Resort - Normal-type	Last Resort: Physical Move	140	100	5	--
This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

20	Sleep Talk	Sleep Talk - Normal-type	Sleep Talk: Other Move	--	101	10	--

The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.
52	Belch	Belch - Poison-type	Belch: Special Move	120	90	10	--
The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.
56	Giga Impact	Giga Impact - Normal-type	Giga Impact: Physical Move	150	90	5	--
The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Absorb	Absorb - Grass-type	Absorb: Special Move	20	100	25	--
A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
—	Helping Hand	Helping Hand - Normal-type	Helping Hand: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.
6	Stun Spore	Stun Spore - Grass-type	Stun Spore: Other Move	--	75	30	--
The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.
12	Mega Drain	Mega Drain - Grass-type	Mega Drain: Special Move	40	100	15	--
A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
15	Razor Leaf	Razor Leaf - Grass-type	Razor Leaf: Physical Move	55	95	25	--
Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
18	Growth	Growth - Normal-type	Growth: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
21	Poison Powder	Poison Powder - Poison-type	Poison Powder: Other Move	--	75	35	--
The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.
24	Giga Drain	Giga Drain - Grass-type	Giga Drain: Special Move	75	100	10	--
A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
27	Charm	Charm - Fairy-type	Charm: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.
30	Leech Seed	Leech Seed - Grass-type	Leech Seed: Other Move	--	90	10	--
A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.
33	Cotton Spore	Cotton Spore - Grass-type	Cotton Spore: Other Move	--	100	40	--
The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stats.
36	Energy Ball	Energy Ball - Grass-type	Energy Ball: Special Move	90	100	10	10
The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
39	Sunny Day	Sunny Day - Fire-type	Sunny Day: Other Move	--	101	5	--
The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.
42	Endeavor	Endeavor - Normal-type	Endeavor: Physical Move	??	100	5	--
This attack move cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.
45	Cotton Guard	Cotton Guard - Grass-type	Cotton Guard: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user's Defense stat.
48	Solar Beam	Solar Beam - Grass-type	Solar Beam: Special Move	120	100	10	--
In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stats.
5	Smack Down	Smack Down - Rock-type	Smack Down: Physical Move	50	100	15	100
The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it's hit.
10	Bulldoze	Bulldoze - Ground-type	Bulldoze: Physical Move	60	100	20	100
The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.
15	Horn Attack	Horn Attack - Normal-type	Horn Attack: Physical Move	65	100	25	--
The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.
20	Scary Face	Scary Face - Normal-type	Scary Face: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
25	Stomp	Stomp - Normal-type	Stomp: Physical Move	65	100	20	30
The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.
30	Rock Blast	Rock Blast - Rock-type	Rock Blast: Physical Move	25	90	10	--
The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.
35	Drill Run	Drill Run - Ground-type	Drill Run: Physical Move	80	95	10	--
The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.
40	Take Down	Take Down - Normal-type	Take Down: Physical Move	90	85	20	--
A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
45	Earthquake	Earthquake - Ground-type	Earthquake: Physical Move	100	100	10	--
The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
50	Stone Edge	Stone Edge - Rock-type	Stone Edge: Physical Move	100	80	5	--
The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.
60	Horn Drill	Horn Drill - Normal-type	Horn Drill: Physical Move	??	30	5	--
The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

36	Psychic	Psychic - Psychic-type	Psychic: Special Move	90	100	10	10
The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
40	Flatter	Flatter - Dark-type	Flatter: Other Move	--	100	15	--
Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.
44	Future Sight	Future Sight - Psychic-type	Future Sight: Special Move	120	100	10	--
Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.
48	Magic Room	Magic Room - Psychic-type	Magic Room: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.
—	Teleport	Teleport - Psychic-type	Teleport: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.
18	Psybeam	Psybeam - Psychic-type	Psybeam: Special Move	65	100	20	10
The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.
24	Power Split	Power Split - Psychic-type	Power Split: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.
24	Guard Split	Guard Split - Psychic-type	Guard Split: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
30	Headbutt	Headbutt - Normal-type	Headbutt: Physical Move	70	100	15	30
The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.
36	Zen Headbutt	Zen Headbutt - Psychic-type	Zen Headbutt: Physical Move	80	90	15	20
The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.
45	Recover	Recover - Normal-type	Recover: Other Move	--	101	10	--
Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.
52	Calm Mind	Calm Mind - Psychic-type	Calm Mind: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
60	Wonder Room	Wonder Room - Psychic-type	Wonder Room: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
68	Psychic	Psychic - Psychic-type	Psychic: Special Move	90	100	10	10
The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

-- Cubchoo

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Powder Snow	Powder Snow - Ice-type	Powder Snow: Special Move	40	100	25	10
The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze opposing Pokémon.
—	Growl	Growl - Normal-type	Growl: Other Move	--	100	40	--
The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
3	Endure	Endure - Normal-type	Endure: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
6	Fury Swipes	Fury Swipes - Normal-type	Fury Swipes: Physical Move	18	80	15	--
The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.
9	Icy Wind	Icy Wind - Ice-type	Icy Wind: Special Move	55	95	15	100
The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.
12	Play Nice	Play Nice - Normal-type	Play Nice: Other Move	--	101	20	100
The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.
15	Brine	Brine - Water-type	Brine: Special Move	65	100	10	--
If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.
18	Frost Breath	Frost Breath - Ice-type	Frost Breath: Special Move	60	90	10	100
The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.
21	Slash	Slash - Normal-type	Slash: Physical Move	70	100	20	--
The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
24	Flail	Flail - Normal-type	Flail: Physical Move	??	100	15	--
The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.
27	Charm	Charm - Fairy-type	Charm: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.
30	Hail	Hail - Ice-type	Hail: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except Ice types.
33	Thrash	Thrash - Normal-type	Thrash: Physical Move	120	100	10	--
The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
36	Rest	Rest - Psychic-type	Rest: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.
39	Blizzard	Blizzard - Ice-type	Blizzard: Special Move	110	70	5	10
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
42	Sheer Cold	Sheer Cold - Ice-type	Sheer Cold: Special Move	??	30	5	--
The target faints instantly. It's less likely to hit the target if it's used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.
54	Crunch	Crunch - Dark-type	Crunch: Physical Move	80	100	15	20
The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

-- Litwick

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Astonish	Astonish - Ghost-type	Astonish: Physical Move	30	100	15	30
The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.
—	Smog	Smog - Poison-type	Smog: Special Move	30	70	20	40
The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.
4	Ember	Ember - Fire-type	Ember: Special Move	40	100	25	10
The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.
8	Minimize	Minimize - Normal-type	Minimize: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
12	Confuse Ray	Confuse Ray - Ghost-type	Confuse Ray: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.
16	Hex	Hex - Ghost-type	Hex: Special Move	65	100	10	--
This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.
20	Will-O-Wisp	Will-O-Wisp - Fire-type	Will-O-Wisp: Other Move	--	85	15	--
The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.
24	Fire Spin	Fire Spin - Fire-type	Fire Spin: Special Move	35	85	15	100
The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.
28	Night Shade	Night Shade - Ghost-type	Night Shade: Special Move	??	100	15	--
The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.
32	Curse	Curse - Ghost-type	Curse: Other Move	--	101	10	--
A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.
36	Shadow Ball	Shadow Ball - Ghost-type	Shadow Ball: Special Move	80	100	15	20
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
40	Inferno	Inferno - Fire-type	Inferno: Special Move	100	50	5	100
The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.
44	Imprison	Imprison - Psychic-type	Imprison: Other Move	--	101	10	--
If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.
48	Pain Split	Pain Split - Normal-type	Pain Split: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.
52	Overheat	Overheat - Fire-type	Overheat: Special Move	130	90	5	100
The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.
56	Memento	Memento - Dark-type	Memento: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

-- Inkay

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Peck	Peck - Flying-type	Peck: Physical Move	35	100	35	--
The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.
—	Tackle	Tackle - Normal-type	Tackle: Physical Move	40	100	35	--
A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
3	Hypnosis	Hypnosis - Psychic-type	Hypnosis: Other Move	--	60	20	--
The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.
6	Wrap	Wrap - Normal-type	Wrap: Physical Move	15	90	20	100
A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.
9	Payback	Payback - Dark-type	Payback: Physical Move	50	100	10	--
The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.
12	Pluck	Pluck - Flying-type	Pluck: Physical Move	60	100	20	--
The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
15	Psybeam	Psybeam - Psychic-type	Psybeam: Special Move	65	100	20	10
The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.
18	Swagger	Swagger - Normal-type	Swagger: Other Move	--	85	15	--
The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.
21	Slash	Slash - Normal-type	Slash: Physical Move	70	100	20	--
The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
24	Night Slash	Night Slash - Dark-type	Night Slash: Physical Move	70	100	15	--
The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.
27	Psycho Cut	Psycho Cut - Psychic-type	Psycho Cut: Physical Move	70	100	20	--
The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.
31	Switcheroo	Switcheroo - Dark-type	Switcheroo: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.
33	Foul Play	Foul Play - Dark-type	Foul Play: Physical Move	95	100	15	--
The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage it deals.
36	Topsy-Turvy	Topsy-Turvy - Dark-type	Topsy-Turvy: Other Move	--	101	20	--
All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.
39	Superpower	Superpower - Fighting-type	Superpower: Physical Move	120	100	5	100
The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
—	After You	After You - Normal-type	After You: Other Move	--	101	15	--
The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

16	Sucker Punch	Sucker Punch - Dark-type	Sucker Punch: Physical Move	70	100	5	--
This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
20	Pin Missile	Pin Missile - Bug-type	Pin Missile: Physical Move	25	95	20	--
Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
24	Giga Drain	Giga Drain - Grass-type	Giga Drain: Special Move	75	100	10	--
A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
28	Sweet Scent	Sweet Scent - Normal-type	Sweet Scent: Other Move	--	100	20	--
A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.
32	Synthesis	Synthesis - Grass-type	Synthesis: Other Move	--	101	5	--
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
36	Petal Blizzard	Petal Blizzard - Grass-type	Petal Blizzard: Physical Move	90	100	15	--
The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.
40	Cotton Spore	Cotton Spore - Grass-type	Cotton Spore: Other Move	--	100	40	--
The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stats.
44	Sunny Day	Sunny Day - Fire-type	Sunny Day: Other Move	--	101	5	--
The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.
48	Solar Beam	Solar Beam - Grass-type	Solar Beam: Special Move	120	100	10	--
In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
52	Acupressure	Acupressure - Normal-type	Acupressure: Other Move	--	101	30	--
The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.
56	Petal Dance	Petal Dance - Grass-type	Petal Dance: Special Move	120	100	10	--
The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
60	Cotton Guard	Cotton Guard - Grass-type	Cotton Guard: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user's Defense stat.

After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
54	Water Spout	Water Spout - Water-type	Water Spout: Special Move	150	100	5	--
The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
44	Superpower	Superpower - Fighting-type	Superpower: Physical Move	120	100	5	100
The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.
48	Fissure	Fissure - Ground-type	Fissure: Physical Move	??	30	5	--
The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.
—	Supersonic	Supersonic - Normal-type	Supersonic: Other Move	--	55	20	--
The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.
—	Bite	Bite - Dark-type	Bite: Physical Move	60	100	25	30
The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.
12	Mud-Slap	Mud-Slap - Ground-type	Mud-Slap: Special Move	20	100	10	100
The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
16	Sand Tomb	Sand Tomb - Ground-type	Sand Tomb: Physical Move	35	85	15	100
The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.
20	Dragon Tail	Dragon Tail - Dragon-type	Dragon Tail: Physical Move	60	90	10	--
The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
24	Screech	Screech - Normal-type	Screech: Other Move	--	85	40	--
An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.
28	Bug Buzz	Bug Buzz - Bug-type	Bug Buzz: Special Move	90	100	10	10
The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
32	Sandstorm	Sandstorm - Rock-type	Sandstorm: Other Move	--	101	10	--
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except Rock, Ground, and Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.
38	Earth Power	Earth Power - Ground-type	Earth Power: Special Move	90	100	10	10
The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
44	Earthquake	Earthquake - Ground-type	Earthquake: Physical Move	100	100	10	--
The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
50	Uproar	Uproar - Normal-type	Uproar: Special Move	90	100	10	--
The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.
56	Dragon Rush	Dragon Rush - Dragon-type	Dragon Rush: Physical Move	100	75	10	20
The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.
62	Boomburst	Boomburst - Normal-type	Boomburst: Special Move	140	100	10	--
The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

48	Giga Impact	Giga Impact - Normal-type	Giga Impact: Physical Move	150	90	5	--

-- Yamask

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Astonish	Astonish - Ghost-type	Astonish: Physical Move	30	100	15	30
The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.
—	Protect	Protect - Normal-type	Protect: Other Move	--	101	10	--
This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
4	Haze	Haze - Ice-type	Haze: Other Move	--	101	30	--
The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
8	Night Shade	Night Shade - Ghost-type	Night Shade: Special Move	??	100	15	--
The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.
12	Disable	Disable - Normal-type	Disable: Other Move	--	100	20	--
For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.
16	Will-O-Wisp	Will-O-Wisp - Fire-type	Will-O-Wisp: Other Move	--	85	15	--
The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.
20	Crafty Shield	Crafty Shield - Fairy-type	Crafty Shield: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.
24	Hex	Hex - Ghost-type	Hex: Special Move	65	100	10	--
This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.
28	Mean Look	Mean Look - Normal-type	Mean Look: Other Move	--	101	5	--
The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.
32	Grudge	Grudge - Ghost-type	Grudge: Other Move	--	101	5	--
If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.
36	Curse	Curse - Ghost-type	Curse: Other Move	--	101	10	--
A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.
40	Shadow Ball	Shadow Ball - Ghost-type	Shadow Ball: Special Move	80	100	15	20
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
44	Dark Pulse	Dark Pulse - Dark-type	Dark Pulse: Special Move	80	100	15	20
The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.
48	Power Split	Power Split - Psychic-type	Power Split: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.
48	Guard Split	Guard Split - Psychic-type	Guard Split: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
52	Destiny Bond	Destiny Bond - Ghost-type	Destiny Bond: Other Move	--	101	5	--
After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

32	Iron Defense	Iron Defense - Steel-type	Iron Defense: Other Move	--	101	15	--
The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

44	Swords Dance	Swords Dance - Normal-type	Swords Dance: Other Move	--	101	20	--
A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.
48	Sacred Sword	Sacred Sword - Fighting-type	Sacred Sword: Physical Move	90	100	15	--
The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

-- Doublade

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Tackle	Tackle - Normal-type	Tackle: Physical Move	40	100	35	--
A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
—	Fury Cutter	Fury Cutter - Bug-type	Fury Cutter: Physical Move	40	95	20	--
The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.
—	Shadow Sneak	Shadow Sneak - Ghost-type	Shadow Sneak: Physical Move	40	100	30	--
The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.
—	Autotomize	Autotomize - Steel-type	Autotomize: Other Move	--	101	15	--
The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
12	Aerial Ace	Aerial Ace - Flying-type	Aerial Ace: Physical Move	60	101	20	--
The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.
16	Metal Sound	Metal Sound - Steel-type	Metal Sound: Other Move	--	85	40	--
A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.
20	Slash	Slash - Normal-type	Slash: Physical Move	70	100	20	--
The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
24	Night Slash	Night Slash - Dark-type	Night Slash: Physical Move	70	100	15	--
The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.
28	Retaliate	Retaliate - Normal-type	Retaliate: Physical Move	70	100	5	--
The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move's power is increased.
32	Iron Defense	Iron Defense - Steel-type	Iron Defense: Other Move	--	101	15	--
The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.
38	Iron Head	Iron Head - Steel-type	Iron Head: Physical Move	80	100	15	30
The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.
44	Power Trick	Power Trick - Psychic-type	Power Trick: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.
50	Swords Dance	Swords Dance - Normal-type	Swords Dance: Other Move	--	101	20	--
A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.
56	Sacred Sword	Sacred Sword - Fighting-type	Sacred Sword: Physical Move	90	100	15	--
The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Astonish	Astonish - Ghost-type	Astonish: Physical Move	30	100	15	30
The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.
—	Tackle	Tackle - Normal-type	Tackle: Physical Move	40	100	35	--
A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
4	Branch Poke	Branch Poke - Grass-type	Branch Poke: Physical Move	40	100	40	--
The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.
8	Leech Seed	Leech Seed - Grass-type	Leech Seed: Other Move	--	90	10	--
A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.
12	Confuse Ray	Confuse Ray - Ghost-type	Confuse Ray: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.
16	Will-O-Wisp	Will-O-Wisp - Fire-type	Will-O-Wisp: Other Move	--	85	15	--
The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.
20	Hex	Hex - Ghost-type	Hex: Special Move	65	100	10	--
This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.
24	Growth	Growth - Normal-type	Growth: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
28	Horn Leech	Horn Leech - Grass-type	Horn Leech: Physical Move	75	100	10	--
The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
32	Curse	Curse - Ghost-type	Curse: Other Move	--	101	10	--
A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.
36	Phantom Force	Phantom Force - Ghost-type	Phantom Force: Physical Move	90	100	10	--
The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.
40	Ingrain	Ingrain - Grass-type	Ingrain: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it's rooted, it can't switch out.
44	Wood Hammer	Wood Hammer - Grass-type	Wood Hammer: Physical Move	120	100	15	--
The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.
48	Destiny Bond	Destiny Bond - Ghost-type	Destiny Bond: Other Move	--	101	5	--
After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
52	Forest's Curse	Forest's Curse - Grass-type	Forest's Curse: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The user puts a forest curse on the target. The target is now Grass type as well.

55	Reversal	Reversal - Fighting-type	Reversal: Physical Move	??	100	15	--

60	Giga Impact	Giga Impact - Normal-type	Giga Impact: Physical Move	150	90	5	--
The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.

The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
16	Flail	Flail - Normal-type	Flail: Physical Move	??	100	15	--
The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.
20	Incinerate	Incinerate - Fire-type	Incinerate: Special Move	60	100	15	--
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
24	Iron Defense	Iron Defense - Steel-type	Iron Defense: Other Move	--	101	15	--
The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
40	Shell Trap	Shell Trap - Fire-type	Shell Trap: Special Move	150	100	5	--
The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on opposing Pokémon.
44	Shell Smash	Shell Smash - Normal-type	Shell Smash: Other Move	--	101	15	--
The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
48	Overheat	Overheat - Fire-type	Overheat: Special Move	130	90	5	100
The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.
52	Explosion	Explosion - Normal-type	Explosion: Physical Move	250	100	5	--
The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.
28	Giga Drain	Giga Drain - Grass-type	Giga Drain: Special Move	75	100	10	--
A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
32	Whirlpool	Whirlpool - Water-type	Whirlpool: Special Move	35	85	15	100
The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.
36	Heavy Slam	Heavy Slam - Steel-type	Heavy Slam: Physical Move	??	100	10	--
The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.
40	Slam	Slam - Normal-type	Slam: Physical Move	80	75	20	--
The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.
44	Shadow Ball	Shadow Ball - Ghost-type	Shadow Ball: Special Move	80	100	15	20
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
48	Metal Sound	Metal Sound - Steel-type	Metal Sound: Other Move	--	85	40	--
A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.
52	Anchor Shot	Anchor Shot - Steel-type	Anchor Shot: Physical Move	80	100	20	--
The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.
56	Energy Ball	Energy Ball - Grass-type	Energy Ball: Special Move	90	100	10	10
The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
60	Phantom Force	Phantom Force - Ghost-type	Phantom Force: Physical Move	90	100	10	--
The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.
64	Power Whip	Power Whip - Grass-type	Power Whip: Physical Move	120	85	10	--
The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to harshly lash the target.

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Growl	Growl - Normal-type	Growl: Other Move	--	100	40	--
The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
—	Water Gun	Water Gun - Water-type	Water Gun: Special Move	40	100	25	--
The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
5	Sing	Sing - Normal-type	Sing: Other Move	--	55	15	--
A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.
10	Mist	Mist - Ice-type	Mist: Other Move	--	101	30	--
The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
15	Life Dew	Life Dew - Water-type	Life Dew: Other Move	--	101	10	--
The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.
20	Ice Shard	Ice Shard - Ice-type	Ice Shard: Physical Move	40	100	30	--
The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.
25	Confuse Ray	Confuse Ray - Ghost-type	Confuse Ray: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.
30	Water Pulse	Water Pulse - Water-type	Water Pulse: Special Move	60	100	20	20
The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.
35	Brine	Brine - Water-type	Brine: Special Move	65	100	10	--
If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.
40	Body Slam	Body Slam - Normal-type	Body Slam: Physical Move	85	100	15	30
The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
45	Ice Beam	Ice Beam - Ice-type	Ice Beam: Special Move	90	100	10	10
The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
50	Rain Dance	Rain Dance - Water-type	Rain Dance: Other Move	--	101	5	--
The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers the power of Fire-type moves.
55	Hydro Pump	Hydro Pump - Water-type	Hydro Pump: Special Move	110	80	5	--
The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
60	Perish Song	Perish Song - Normal-type	Perish Song: Other Move	--	101	5	--
Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.
65	Sheer Cold	Sheer Cold - Ice-type	Sheer Cold: Special Move	??	30	5	--
The target faints instantly. It's less likely to hit the target if it's used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

32	Mimic	Mimic - Normal-type	Mimic: Other Move	--	101	10	--

The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.
—	Scratch	Scratch - Normal-type	Scratch: Physical Move	40	100	35	--
Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.
—	Growl	Growl - Normal-type	Growl: Other Move	--	100	40	--
The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
—	Ember	Ember - Fire-type	Ember: Special Move	40	100	25	10
The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.
—	Smokescreen	Smokescreen - Normal-type	Smokescreen: Other Move	--	100	20	--
The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.
12	Dragon Breath	Dragon Breath - Dragon-type	Dragon Breath: Special Move	60	100	20	30
The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
19	Fire Fang	Fire Fang - Fire-type	Fire Fang: Physical Move	65	95	15	10
The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.
24	Slash	Slash - Normal-type	Slash: Physical Move	70	100	20	--
The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
30	Flamethrower	Flamethrower - Fire-type	Flamethrower: Special Move	90	100	15	10
The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
39	Scary Face	Scary Face - Normal-type	Scary Face: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
46	Fire Spin	Fire Spin - Fire-type	Fire Spin: Special Move	35	85	15	100
The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.
54	Inferno	Inferno - Fire-type	Inferno: Special Move	100	50	5	100
The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.
62	Flare Blitz	Flare Blitz - Fire-type	Flare Blitz: Physical Move	120	100	15	10
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.

-- Type: Null

Standard Level Up
Level	Attack Name	Type	Cat.	Att.	Acc.	PP	Effect %
—	Tackle	Tackle - Normal-type	Tackle: Physical Move	40	100	35	--
A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
—	Imprison	Imprison - Psychic-type	Imprison: Other Move	--	101	10	--
If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.
5	Aerial Ace	Aerial Ace - Flying-type	Aerial Ace: Physical Move	60	101	20	--
The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.
10	Scary Face	Scary Face - Normal-type	Scary Face: Other Move	--	100	10	--
The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
15	Double Hit	Double Hit - Normal-type	Double Hit: Physical Move	35	90	10	--
The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.
20	Metal Sound	Metal Sound - Steel-type	Metal Sound: Other Move	--	85	40	--
A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.
25	Crush Claw	Crush Claw - Normal-type	Crush Claw: Physical Move	75	95	10	50
The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
30	Air Slash	Air Slash - Flying-type	Air Slash: Special Move	75	95	15	30
The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.
35	Tri Attack	Tri Attack - Normal-type	Tri Attack: Special Move	80	100	10	20
The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
40	X-Scissor	X-Scissor - Bug-type	X-Scissor: Physical Move	80	100	15	--
The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
45	Iron Head	Iron Head - Steel-type	Iron Head: Physical Move	80	100	15	30
The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.
50	Take Down	Take Down - Normal-type	Take Down: Physical Move	90	85	20	--
A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
55	Double-Edge	Double-Edge - Normal-type	Double-Edge: Physical Move	120	100	15	--
A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
40	Dragon Pulse	Dragon Pulse - Dragon-type	Dragon Pulse: Special Move	85	100	10	--
The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.
44	Body Slam	Body Slam - Normal-type	Body Slam: Physical Move	85	100	15	30
The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
48	Hyper Voice	Hyper Voice - Normal-type	Hyper Voice: Special Move	90	100	10	--
The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.
54	Dragon Rush	Dragon Rush - Dragon-type	Dragon Rush: Physical Move	100	75	10	20
The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.
60	Nasty Plot	Nasty Plot - Dark-type	Nasty Plot: Other Move	--	101	20	--
The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.
68	Outrage	Outrage - Dragon-type	Outrage: Physical Move	120	100	10	--
The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
76	Hyper Beam	Hyper Beam - Normal-type	Hyper Beam: Special Move	150	90	5	--
The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
15	Protect	Protect - Normal-type	Protect: Other Move	--	101	10	--
This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
20	Flail	Flail - Normal-type	Flail: Physical Move	??	100	15	--
The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.
25	Water Pulse	Water Pulse - Water-type	Water Pulse: Special Move	60	100	20	20
The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.
30	Rain Dance	Rain Dance - Water-type	Rain Dance: Other Move	--	101	5	--
